text: manusyare, ninnal ninnalute nathaneat bhaktiyullavaravuka. oru pitavinum tanre makan orupakaravum ceyyanavatta, oru makannum tanre pitavin ottum prayeajanappetatta oru naline ninnal bhayappetuka. niscayamayum allahuvinre vagdanam satyaman. atinal aihikajivitam ninnale vancikkatirikkatte. keatum catiyanaya pisacum allahuvinre karyattil ninnale vancikkatirikkatte
